title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight -  Volanta
description:
In this video I will show you a new tool released by ORBX called Volanta. The tools has a lot of options such as:

- flight tracking
- flight planning
- challenges

Each item will be shortly explained in this video after which you can decide if you want to start to use Volanta.

The mod can be downloaded from the site below:

https://volanta.app/
